description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to develop, implement and assess a general music program for grades 5-12. Optional field experience component. Offered annually in the first-half of the fall semester. Prerequisite: EDUC 330 and EDUC 355.
name: Teaching Music-Middle/High School
notes: Open to rising seniors and juniors only.
Meets in the first half of the semester.
title: Teaching of Music in the Middle and High School
